name: Nightmare Smash
description:
This game was made for the 2022 August Summer Slow Games Jam. https://itch.io/jam/ssjbossfight

Fight your way through the nightmares of Lucas, a little kid armed with a flashlight. Rescue his friend Tommy Turtle, and defeat the evil monster haunting his dreams.

On the title screen, you can use w/s and space to navigate to the controls menu, then you can see the rest of them.
